entries: Commoners include peasants, serfs, slaves, servants, pilgrims, merchants, artisans, and hermits.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Algoz is a 15th-level spellcaster. Him spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 18}, +10 to hit with spell attacks). He can cast the following spells:

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The algoz has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the algoz has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the algoz scores against a {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: The algoz ignores {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the algoz is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the algoz instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The algoz's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the algoz can take the {@action Hide} action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Deep Wound
entries: When hitting a creature other than an undead or construct, Algoz deals a mortal wound. The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or lose {@dice 1d10} hit points at the start of its turn. Each time the Algoz attacks the target with the wound, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10}. Any creature can take an action to stop the wound with a successful {@dc 15} Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

bonus.name: Engage
entries: Algoz teleports to a point he can see within 30 feet, a school of illusion rune is left in place.

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: Algoz casts an illusion spell and makes two attacks with his daggers or one attack with his bracelet.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +13} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d4 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bracer of Flying Daggers
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 6d4 + 8}) piercing damage, plus 15 ({@damage 6d4}) force damage.

reaction.name: Blade Blast.
entries: Immediately after casting Conjure Volley, the Algoz can use its reaction to blast all daggers in the spell's area, all creatures must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, on a failed save the target takes ({@damage 8d8}) piercing damage, or half as much damage on a success.

reaction.name: Mirror Image
entries: After using two engages, Algoz can use its reaction to cast {@spell mirror image} without components. After casting all runes disappear.
